title: More Businesses Biden Can Blame for Inflation
sub_head: The White House still hasnâ€™t explained why his inauguration triggered a year of greed.
body:
The White House and congressional Democrats have decided that bashing businesses for rising prices is more politically useful than admitting Washington fault for the debt-fueled federal spending, misguided incentives and epic money creation that are driving inflation.
Team Biden has recently blamed food companies like meat and poultry producers for rising prices. The president and his Democratic allies have also targeted energy companies.
